statements: SELECT * FROM faq WHERE id = 1;

SELECT answer, question FROM faq WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM faq WHERE id = 4 ORDER BY question DESC;
SELECT id, question FROM faq WHERE id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM faq WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question, answer FROM faq WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT answer FROM faq WHERE id < 5 AND question LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, question FROM faq WHERE answer IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT id, question, answer FROM faq WHERE question LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM category ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT faq.id, faq.question, category.name FROM faq JOIN category ON faq.id = category.id;
SELECT * FROM FAQ;
SELECT question, answer FROM FAQ WHERE faq_id = 1;
SELECT category_name FROM Category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT faq_id, category_id FROM FAQ_Category WHERE faq_id = 1 AND category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM FAQ_Category WHERE category_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY faq_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM FAQ ORDER BY faq_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT question, answer FROM FAQ WHERE faq_id = 5;
SELECT faq_id, question, answer FROM FAQ WHERE question LIKE '%how%' AND answer LIKE '%details%';
SELECT faq_id, question, category_name FROM FAQ JOIN FAQ_Category ON FAQ.faq_id = FAQ_Category.faq_id JOIN Category ON FAQ_Category.category_id = Category.category_id ORDER BY faq_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_faqs FROM FAQ;

SELECT category_name FROM category
SELECT username FROM user
SELECT * FROM faq WHERE faq_id = 1;
SELECT question, answer FROM faq WHERE faq_id = 1;
SELECT faq.question, faq.answer, category.category_name FROM faq JOIN faq_category ON faq.faq_id = faq_category.faq_id JOIN category ON faq_category.category_id = category.category_id;
SELECT faq.question, faq.answer, user.username FROM faq JOIN user ON faq.faq_id = user.user_id;

SELECT faq.question, faq.answer, category.category_name FROM faq JOIN faq_category ON faq.faq_id = faq_category.faq_id JOIN category ON faq_category.category_id = category.category_id WHERE faq.faq_id > 2;
SELECT id, question, answer FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question, answer FROM faq_questions WHERE id = 1;

SELECT id, category_name FROM faq_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT id, tag_name FROM faq_tags WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM faq_questions;
SELECT question, answer FROM faq_questions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question, answer FROM faq_questions WHERE id > 1 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM faq_categories JOIN faq_questions ON faq_categories.id = faq_questions.id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT q.question, t.tag_name FROM faq_questions q JOIN faq_question_tags qt ON q.id = qt.question_id JOIN faq_tags t ON qt.tag_id = t.id;
